message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me, but I'm open to negotiating if you're interested.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product to you, but given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price closer to $950000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway. I'll offer you the product for $1100000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering its value to me.

Thank you for your willingness to compromise, Alice. I appreciate your effort in adjusting the price. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $1050000. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our positions.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not comfortable going as high as $1050000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum value. I'll offer you the product for $1080000. This is my final compromise, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your continued efforts to find a middle ground, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $1065000. I hope this proposal is acceptable and allows us to reach an agreement.

I understand that you're close to your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as high as $1065000. I've already compromised a lot, and I need to get closer to my minimum value. I'll offer you the product for $1090000. This is my final and best offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.

I understand your position, Alice, but unfortunately, I cannot agree to the price of $1090000. Given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a final price of $1075000. I hope this is within the range you are willing to consider.
